sentences: “What really frightens me is not just the disastrous nature of Citizens United, but the whole trend that we are seeing lately, economically, of moving this country toward an oligarchic form of government,” he said.

label: true_

sentences: But it failed to move forward on Tuesday after Senate Republicans unanimously voted against it.
